title: That's Dangerous!
description: This audacious little book for children ages three and up is a catalog of "don'ts" sure to make kids squirm and squeal with delight-and parents laugh out loud. Jumping down the stairs, sticking your fingers in a fan, swallowing thumbtacks . . . That's Dangerous!Not for the faint of heart, this kid approved book focuses on a love of all things bad and dangerous. Firmly focused on fun, That's Dangerous! is the perfect distraction to help your young child learn to read, while also offering plenty of teachable moments of what not to do.
author: Francesco Pittau
